DOC.brief_summary: This study design determine woman undergo cesarean delivery spinal anesthesia routine pain management also additional ultrasound guide transversus abdominis plane ( TAP ) block use ropivacaine well pain relief well quality recovery woman n't additional TAP block . Maximizing pain relief use ultrasound guide TAP block addition neuraxial opioids , NSAIDs , acetaminophen may improve acute pain outcome , reduce adverse side effect , potentially reduce chronic pain .
DOC.brief_title: Abdominal Wall Local Anesthesia Maximize Postoperative Pain Control After Cesarean Delivery
